name: UNIDO Industrial Analytics Platform
description: UNIDO's IAP is a data-driven knowledge platform that advances evidence-based policy dialogue, fosters thought leadership and connects global communities to share knowledge and practice in the field of industrial development.

SDGs.evidenceText: The UNIDO IAP can be used for both outreach and capacity-building workshops in how to strive for evidence-based policymaking.

The SDG-9 Industry Index can be used to identify the dimensions that have an impact on the performance of Indonesia towards achieving the SDG-9 industry-related targets. It comprises the following dimensions: manufacturing value added, manufacturing employment, technological sophistication of manufacturing production and the manufacturing sectorâ€™s environmental performance. The Index tracks the performance of a country over time and in relation to other economies.
Through its blog articles, the UNIDO IAP facilitates partnerships between a variety of actors for the Common Agenda and the Agenda 2030.

repositories.name: IAP Competitive Industries & Global Value Chains
